Frequently asked questions

Everything you need to know about Range Rush.

Poker ranges are the complete set of hands a player might hold in a given situation. Instead of putting opponents on one specific hand, skilled players think in ranges—considering all possible holdings based on position, action, and tendencies.

Range Rush presents you with preflop spots and challenges you to make the correct decision—fold, call, or raise—under time pressure. After each decision, you see the GTO-optimal play instantly, building your preflop instincts through rapid repetition.

Yes, Range Rush is completely free to play. Download Stack Poker and start drilling your preflop ranges immediately with no cost or subscription required.

Consistent practice with immediate feedback is key. Range Rush provides thousands of preflop scenarios with instant GTO comparisons, helping you internalize correct plays until they become automatic.

Start Training Your Ranges

Free to play. No subscription required.
